alert.note: Alert for Lower Clark Fork Region; West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 2:56PM MST until January 12 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 2 inches and ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Bad Rock Canyon, Essex, Highway 83 Bigfork to Swan Lake, Marias Pass, Polebridge, Evaro Hill, Highway 200 Thompson Falls to Plains, Highway 200 Trout Creek to Heron, and I- 90 Lookout Pass to Haugan. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 8 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lower Clark Fork Region; West Glacier Region
